level.heading: Partner's power to bind partnership after dissolution.
level.text: Subject to § 29-608.05, a partnership shall be bound by a partner's act after dissolution that:
Is appropriate for winding up the partnership activities and affairs; or
Would have bound the partnership under § 29-603.01 before dissolution, if the other party to the transaction did not have notice of the dissolution.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 29-608.02, § 29-608.05, and § 29-608.06.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "activities and affairs" for "business" in (1).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 804 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act).
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
